T.title: Trigger
T.subtitle: The Pulse of the Enterprise
T.description: The Trigger stage initiates the integration loop. Unlike traditional batch ETL, TITAN prioritizes real-time, event-driven pulses that allow the business to react instantly to changes.

patterns.name: Webhooks
patterns.desc: Push-based HTTP callbacks from SaaS apps.

patterns.name: Change Data Capture (CDC)
patterns.desc: Database log mining for zero-impact extraction.

patterns.name: Event Sourcing
patterns.desc: Storing state changes as an immutable sequence of events.

I.title: Ingest
I.subtitle: Contextual Awareness
I.description: Raw triggers are rarely enough. The Ingest stage is responsible for 'The Claim Check Pattern'â€”taking a lightweight ID and hydrating it with the full context needed for decision making.

patterns.name: Claim Check
patterns.desc: Passing a reference ID to keep the message bus light.

patterns.name: Enrichment
patterns.desc: Calling external APIs to append missing data.

patterns.name: Normalization
patterns.desc: Converting proprietary schemas to a Canonical Data Model.

T2.title: Think
T2.subtitle: The Intelligence Layer
T2.description: This is the differentiator. Instead of blindly routing data, TITAN assesses the situation. Is this a standard order? Is it fraud? Does it require VP approval?

patterns.name: Content-Based Routing
patterns.desc: Directing flow based on payload data.

patterns.name: Agentic AI
patterns.desc: Using LLMs to make unstructured decisions.

A.title: Act
A.subtitle: Deterministic Execution
A.description: The 'Muscle' of the operation. Once a decision is made, the Act stage executes the state change in the target system. Reliability and idempotency are paramount here.

patterns.name: Idempotency
patterns.desc: Ensuring re-running the same action doesn't duplicate results.

patterns.name: Circuit Breaker
patterns.desc: Failing fast when downstream systems are down.

N.title: Notify
N.subtitle: Resolution & Feedback
N.description: Closing the loop. Every action generates a receipt. The Notify stage informs stakeholders of success, handles errors, or triggers human-in-the-loop remediation.

patterns.name: Dead Letter Queue
patterns.desc: Parking failed messages for later analysis.
